trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the blaze or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Ignition
entries: If the blaze deals fire damage to a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The blaze sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the blaze moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blaze makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Blast
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Ball of Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The blaze sends a small ball of fire streaking toward a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Once the ball reaches its destination or impacts against a solid surface, it explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ball explodes takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage ({@dc 14} Dexterity save for half).

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The creeper ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Grass Camouflage
entries: The creeper has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in grassy terrain.

trait.name: Supercharge
entries: When the creeper takes lightning damage, it becomes supercharged, amplifying its explosive power. The creeper's Explode action deals double damage, and its radius increases to 30 feet.

action.name: Explode
entries: The creeper reduces itself to 0 hit points and explodes. Each creature within 15 feet of the creeper takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage ({@dc 13} Dexterity save for half).

monster.name: Ender Dragon

spellcasting.name: Innate Psionics
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 26}). She can cast the following spells using psionics, requiring no components:
footerEntries: *The target needn't be on the same plane of existence as the dragon.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The dragon can burrow through any nonmagical material and leaves a 15-foot-diameter tunnel in her wake. She can also move through creatures and magical objects as if they were difficult terrain, but she takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage if she ends her turn inside of an object.

trait.name: Psychic Barrier
entries: At the start of each of her turns, the dragon gains 10 temporary hit points and can end one condition on herself, provided the dragon has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Legendary Reaction
entries: The dragon can spend one legendary action to take a reaction, even when she has already used her normal reaction.

trait.name: Draconic Might
entries: The dragon's weapon attacks are magical and deal quadruple damage to objects and structures. When she hits a target with a melee attack, if the attack roll meets or exceeds the target's passive Strength ({@skill Athletics}) score, the dragon can push it up to 10 feet away, or 20 feet away if her mythic trait is active.

trait.name: Shockwave (Mythic Trait; Once Per Rest)
entries: If the dragon would be reduced to 0 hit points, she instead resets to maximum hit points, and she can end any spells of her choice on herself. She then releases a huge roar that disrupts gravity in a 1 mile radius, causing an {@spell earthquake} spell (spell save {@dc 26}) to ravage the area for 1 minute (no concentration required).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h} 20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) force damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}) and is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. The dragon can have only one creature {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h} 22 ({@damage 2d12 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales psychic energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature and object in that area takes 77 ({@damage 11d12}) damage ({@dc 25} saving throw for half; see below), with the damage type, save type, and determined by the option she chooses below.
The dragon can't use the same option twice in a row.

items.name: Blinding Breath
items.entry: The breath does radiant damage, and the save type is Constitution. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Disorienting Breath
items.entry: The breath does psychic damage, and the save type is Intelligence. The area is then infused with psychic dissonance for 1 minute; creatures other than the dragon that end their turn in the area must subtract a {@dice d6} from each of their attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of their next turn.

items.name: Gravity Breath
items.entry: The breath does force damage, and the save type is Strength. Until the end of the dragon's next turn, the entire area is affected by a {@spell reverse gravity} spell, except that the dragon can orient gravity in any direction.

bonus.name: Psychic Step
entries: The dragon uses psionics to teleport to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of her.

bonus.name: Telekinetic Slide
entries: The dragon uses psionics to telekinetically one creature of her choice up to 30 feet in a horizontal direction of her choice ({@dc 26} Strength save for half distance).

reaction.name: Psychic Barrier
entries: The dragon halves the damage it takes from a ranged attack. To do so, the dragon must see the attacker.

reaction.name: Telekinetic Backlash
entries: In response to taking damage from a melee attack, the dragon can push the attacker up to 30 feet away from her ({@dc 26} Strength save for half distance).

legendary.name: Wild Talent
entries: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Telekinetic Slide.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Innate Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses her Innate Psionics.

mythicHeader: If the dragon's mythic trait has been activated within the last hour, she can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Potent Psionics
entries: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Telekinetic Slide, and the distance teleported or moved by them is doubled.

mythic.name: Psionic Mastery
entries: The dragon regains one use of one of her spells.

mythic.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack against each creature of her choice within 20 feet of her.

trait.name: Jump Scare
entries: If the enderman uses its Teleport on its turn, it has advantage on the next melee attack made before the end of the turn.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the enderman moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enderman makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

The enderman can choose to {@condition grappled|phb|grapple} the target instead of dealing damage. While {@condition grappled}, the target is also {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 13}). The enderman can only grapple one target at a time.

bonus.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The enderman magically teleports, along with any objects and equipment it is wearing and carrying, to any other location within 400 feet of it. The enderman needn't see the location in order to teleport to it, but if it would arrive in a place already occupied by an object or a creature, the enderman takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage and fails to teleport.

reaction.name: Warp Away
entries: In response to being hit by an attack, the enderman can use its Teleport if it is available. When it does, the triggering attack misses it.

monster.name: Ghast
languages: understands Deep Speech but only makes screaming and screeching noises

trait.name: Share Pain
entries: If the ghast takes psychic damage, each creature within 120 feet of the ghast takes that damage as well. In addition, creatures within 30 feet of the ghast have disadvantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

trait.name: Inscrutable Thoughts
entries: The ghast's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic. Furthermore, any creature that attempts to communicate with the ghast telepathically must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the ghast's next turn.

action.name: Fire Blast
entries: The ghast sends a ball of fire streaking toward a point within 120 feet of it. Once the ball reaches its destination or impacts against a solid surface, the ball explodes. Each creature within 10 feet of the point where the ball explodes takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage ({@dc 18} Dexterity save for half).

legendaryHeader: The ghast can take 3 legendary actions each round, choosing from the options below.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The ghast flies up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Invoke Dread
entries: The ghast shrieks within the mind of one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the ghast's next turn.

legendary.name: Wail (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ghast lets out a terrible wail. Each creature within 120 feet of the ghast that can hear the wail takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage ({@dc 18} Charisma saving throw for half).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The pillager has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the pillager's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pillager makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The pillager moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

bonus.name: Destroy
entries: The pillager makes a weapon attack against an object or structure.

monster.name: Raid Captain

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raid captain has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raid captain's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Raid Leader
entries: The raid captain and allies within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained} while the raid captain isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The raid captain makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonusHeader: The raid captain can take two different bonus actions on its turn.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The raid captain moves up its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

bonus.name: Leadership
entries: The raid captain utters a special command to one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the creature can hear it, it can add a {@dice d6} to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of the raid captain's next turn.

bonus.name: Destroy
entries: The raid captain makes a weapon attack against an object or structure.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The ravager deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the ravager moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the ravager can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Destroy
entries: The ravager makes a melee attack against an object or structure.

monster.name: Warden
languages: understands Common and Deep Speech but doesn't speak

trait.name: Unyielding Essence
entries: The warden is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form, as well as those that would read its thoughts or magically influence its thoughts or behavior. Creatures that attempt to communicate telepathically with the warden or magically influence its actions or mind instead take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The warden has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell. Furthermore, the warden can hear telepathic communications within 60 feet of it as if they were spoken aloud.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The warden has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the warden is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The warden ignores {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Relentless
entries: If the warden takes 30 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Destroyer
entries: The warden deals quadruple damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Shambler
entries: When it doesn't detect any creatures nearby, the warden's speed is halved.

trait.name: Burrower
entries: The warden can burrow through dirt, solid stone, and sculk without disturbing the material.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warden makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 30 magical bludgeoning damage. The warden can forgo this damage to instead {@condition grappled|phb|grapple} the target (escape {@dc 20}).

action.name: Sonic Boom {@recharge 5}
entries: The warden unleashes a sonic boom in a line that is 5 feet wide and 60 feet long. Each creature and object in the area takes  ({@dc 20} Constitution save for half). On a failed save, a creature is also pushed up to 20 feet away from the warden, knocked {@condition prone}, and {@condition deafened} until the end of the warden's next turn.

bonus.name: Destroy
entries: The warden makes a slam attack against an object or structure.

bonus.name: Sniff
entries: The warden makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check using its sense of smell.

reaction.name: Immovable
entries: When the warden is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it {@condition prone}, or both, the warden is neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Wither

trait.name: Destructive Burrow
entries: The wither can burrow through any nonmagical material or structure and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The wither ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Three Heads
entries: The wither has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Wither
entries: When a creature fails its saving throw against a wither skull, it becomes {@condition poisoned}. At the end of each of its turns, the {@condition poisoned} target can make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. It takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, and the effect ends on a successful one. While {@condition poisoned} by this effect, a creature can't regain hit points.

trait.name: Withering Heights (Mythic Trait; 1/Rest)
entries: If the wither would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total is reset to 225 instead. It then unleashes a large explosion, dealing 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage to each creature within 20 feet of it ({@dc 19} Dexterity save for half) and pushing them up to 20 feet away from it in a straight line. The wither then loses access to its flying speed for 1 hour, but its other speeds are doubled during that time.

trait.name: Aura of Unlife
entries: The wither emits an aura of negative energy out to a radius of 30 feet. Non-undead creatures in the area can't regain hit points and have disadvantage on death saving throws.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The wither deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Shriek
entries: Each non-undead creature within 120 feet of the wither that can hear the wither's shriek must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the wither's next turn.

action.name: Summon Spawn
entries: A {@creature wither skeleton|MC} emerges from a point on the ground within 30 feet of the wither. This wither skeleton acts on the same turn as the wither and follow its orders to the best of its ability. The wither can only have four wither skeletons summoned a time.

action.name: Explosive Charge {@recharge 5}
entries: The wither moves up to its speed in a straight line, passing through the space of any creature in the area without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature within 10 feet of any space it moves through takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage ({@dc 21} Strength save for half). On a failed save, a creature is also knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Feed on Weakness
entries: When a non-undead creature within 30 feet of the wither fails a saving throw or is reduced to 0 hit points, the wither can choose to either regain 20 hit points or gain advantage on its next saving throw.

reaction.name: Undead Army
entries: When a humanoid within 30 feet of the wither dies, it can use Summon Spawn to raise its corpse as a {@creature wither skeleton|MC}. This undead does not count towards the maximum of four wither skeletons listed in that ability.

legendaryHeader: The wither can take 3 legendary actions each round, choosing from the options below.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The wither moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Wither Skull
entries: The wither sends a wither skull streaking toward a point within 120 feet of it. Once the skull reaches its destination or impacts against a solid surface, the skull explodes. Each creature and object within 15 feet of the point where the skull explodes takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage ({@dc 20} Constitution save for half).

monster.name: Wither Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

trait.name: Wither
entries: When the wither skeleton hits a target with a melee attack, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. At the end of each of its turns, the {@condition poisoned} target repeats the saving throw. It takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, and the effect ends on a successful one. While {@condition poisoned} by this effect, a creature can't regain hit points.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h} 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The zombie has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the zombie's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Mob Behavior
entries: The zombie can attempt to {@action grapple} or {@action shove} a creature if at least one of the zombie's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
